extendedInfo.description: DuckDuckGo Search & Stories offers you a better way to search and a new take on Stories.  â¢ Search anonymously.  â¢ Find instantly.  â¢ Stay informed.Search anonymously. We believe in better search and real privacy at the same time. That's why:  â¢ We don't track you: http://donttrack.us/  â¢ We don't filter bubble you: http://dontbubble.us/  â¢ We don't collect or share your personal information.  â¢ When you search DuckDuckGo, you are anonymous.Find instantly. Our app has tons of instant answers, which means you have to work less to get what you really want.   â¢ Get answers from hundreds of sources.  â¢ Auto-complete to answers instead of just searches.  â¢ Search directly on thousands of other sites with !bang commands. Stay informed. We only feature the most shared stories from hand-crafted sources:  â¢ Just #1 stories like most emailed or upvoted  â¢ No repeat topics per day (even across sources)  â¢ Readability view with search suggestions that tie Search & Stories together.We love feedback. You can always reach us at https://duckduckgo.com/feedback, or via email at android@duckduckgo.com.  We listen!***FAQHow do I replace Stories with Recent Searches? Tap settings icon (three horizontal lines) -> Settings -> Home screen view -> Recent searches.What story sources are currently available?   â¢ Current events: BBC, CNN, Digg, Drudge Report, NPR, reddit Politics, Reuters, The Guardian, reddit TrueReddit, reddit Worldnews, Yahoo!;   â¢ Entertainment: reddit Aww, Dear Abby, reddit Funny, reddit Movies, reddit Music, People, reddit Pics;   â¢ Magazine: Browser, Feature, Longform, The New Yorker, Time;  â¢ Newspaper: New York Times, Wall Street Journal;  â¢ Sports: ESPN, Grantland;  â¢ Technology: reddit Gaming, Hacker News, Lifehacker, reddit Programming, reddit Science, Slashdot, reddit Technology;  â¢ Trivia: reddit AMA (Ask me Anything), Quora, reddit TIL (Today I Learned)Tags: duckduckgo, duck duck go, ddg, ddgo, duck search, search, search engine, privacy, private search, private browser.

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Often locks up and force closes.
reviews.author: Jim James

reviews.title: An Excellent Search App
reviews.comment: I really love this app. Truly great work guys. It is simple, stable, and really fast. Plus the built in browser just works. I love it.
reviews.author: Michael Dacre

reviews.title: Better than google
reviews.comment: You get actual search results and not just ads. The reader feature is a nice little bonus too. Not to mention the company ACTUALLY VALUES CONSUMER PRIVACY
reviews.author: Jason Rodgers

reviews.title: Awesome App. A Must Have...
reviews.comment: If you like your privacy then \"Duck Duck Go\" is a must have apps.
reviews.author: B White

reviews.title: Excellent!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.comment: Now I don\'t feel like my wonderful mom,  is reading over my shoulder.
reviews.author: Jesu grifa

reviews.title: Should be on every phone.
reviews.comment: Great alternative news feed source.  Been using DDG to search for years. Keep it up!
reviews.author: Richard Laurin

reviews.title: Annoying
reviews.comment: Can\'t set favorites,  won\'t center on page without major effort. Not for me
reviews.author: andrew t

reviews.title: Outstanding
reviews.comment: The best search engine ever! Realy fast and reliable better than google
reviews.author: Azimul hussain

reviews.title: A beer to DDG\'s team
reviews.comment: Excellent app; light, easy to use and good search engine (better than G).
reviews.author: Adilson Sandoval

reviews.title: Made the switch!
reviews.comment: I was a bit hesitant about switching from the \"mainstream\" search engines. But this is a first class app with some really great features and I am 100% satisfied! Wonder if I can replace my HTC blinkfeed with this...
reviews.author: Quadir Ali

reviews.comment: For privacy it\'s great. But it needs to make it\'s search engine more robust.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Look out google!
reviews.comment: Gr8 app. Works v quick on note 2
reviews.author: Louise Lange

reviews.title: loved
reviews.comment: It used to  b underrated...now it looks quite fine... its pretty hot
reviews.author: Abdul Mouiz

reviews.title: Widget is lame
reviews.comment: The search widget just opens the app, what\'s the point. It takes up all of the screen space for no purpose. Just another search engine, lets see how private it is once the $$$ starts following.
reviews.author: Christopher Stone

reviews.title: More than just a search engine
reviews.comment: News and personalization are a big advantage with this app. Kudos to the developer.
reviews.author: Catalin Deluxus

reviews.title: Great alternative to Google
reviews.comment: Good search results and the ability to replace the swipe up to Now for search is its best feature.  The interface is good but is reminiscint of Gingerbread.
reviews.author: Tim Savage

reviews.title: The best search provider and app. Period.
reviews.comment: Duckduckgo gives us everything google and bing don\'t: Privacy. No ads. No irrelevant marketing or social results. No BS. Simple, to the point, fast and stable. Gives you what you want, results for your searches, not BS. It even has Zero Click which gives you the information you want without having to click on anything. Plus, this app has Stories which is amazing and a great browser.
reviews.author: Goglesuks Smith

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Never enjoyed a browser so much. Keep up the good work. Great tablet interface. Love it. Even found my little site. With proper placement, super fast.
reviews.author: Rozy Lenz

reviews.title: Superb.
reviews.comment: Loving the PC version for a long time,  so happy yo see this here. Nice simple widget. Enjoy the variety of news sources too.
reviews.author: Giles Peach
